configuration.intro: For now I'll place all config type details in here. Later we can move to proper place. <1>Language</1>
configuration.iiif-server: <1>IIIF Server</1>The International Image Interoperability Framework (IIIF) is a protocol for standardized image retrieval created by a community of the world’s leading research libraries, major national libraries and not-for-profit image repositories in an effort to collaboratively produce an interoperable technology and community framework for image delivery.

description.part1: To get started, edit <1>src/App.js</1> and save to reload.
